front.title: Management Information Base for the Group Domain of Interpretation

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)for use with network management protocols. In particular thisdocument describes a high-level Management Information Base for GroupDomain of Interpretation (GDOI), which is used for secure groupcommunication in Ipsec-based networks. This draft describes managedobjects used for implementations of the GDOI protocol.].
